name: Water Wizards
description:
This game was made for KrassJam 4 in 72 hours.

A/D or Left/Right to Steer

Left Shift to Turbo

Dodge the rocks and wizards and stay alive as long as possible.

Credit:

Krassenstein - Programming, Some Art

Waterytart - Music, Water Shader

Assets Used: 

Free Boulder Pack

Fire & Spell Effects

Fantasy Monster(Wizard)
